name: Simple Snake [PlayDate]
description:
PlayDate is a console developed by Panic.

This is a simple and classic Snake, no more, no less. You can download the game or take a look at the source code to take notes, I hope it helps you. What can it do?
  •  Snake can move properly
  •  Game repeats if snake is out of the screen
  •  Snake can eat points and get bigger doing so.
  •  Game repeats if snake eats itself
  •  Game goes faster each time the snake eats a point
